Algorithm
-------
CQPCorr: Censored Quantile Partial Correlation


Maintainer
-------
Yaqing Xu <yaqing.xu@yale.edu>

Publication
-------
Yaqing Xu, Mengyun Wu, Qingzhao Zhang, and Shuangge Ma (2017). Robust Identification of Gene-environment Interactions for Prognosis Using a Censored Quantile Partial Correlation Approach (Under review)

Usage
-------
1. Functions: 
    + reweight: to calculate weights for step I in cqpcorr
    + cqpcorr: the algorithm for calculating CQPCorr 
  
  
2. Example: to obtain the correlation matrix using simulated data
